content.text:
# List of World War II aces from Norway

This is a list of fighter aces in World War II from Norway. For other countries see List of World War II aces by country
{| class="wikitable sortable"
|-
!Name !! Kills !!  Awards !! Notes
|-
| Aanjesen, Ola Gert || align="right"| 7 ||  ||
|-
| Austeen, Arne  || align="right"| 6 ||  || KIA 4 May 1945
|-
| Bache, Knut || align="right"| 5 ||  || KIA 7 May 1944
|-
| Berg, Rolf Arne || align="right"| 7 || War Cross, DFC with bar || KIA 3 February 1945
|-
| Bjørnstad, Bjørn || align="right"| 6 ||  ||
|-
| Christie, Werner || align="right"| 10 || War Cross, DSO || POW from April 1945
|-
| Djønne, Olav || align="right"| 5 ||  ||
|-
| Dogger, Ragnar || align="right"| 6 ||  ||
|-
| Eriksen, Marius, Jr.  || align="right"| 9 || War Cross, DFM, SA || POW after May 1943
|-
| Fearnley, Frederik Arild Sverdrup || align="right"| 7 ||  || KIA 25 February 1944
|-
| Fossum, Erik Petersen || align="right"| 6 ||  ||
|-
| Gran, Martin Yngvar || align="right"| 10 || War Cross, DFC with two bars ||
|-
| Grundt Spang, Helner Gustav Einer || align="right"| 11 || War Cross ||
|-
| Heglund, Svein || align="right"| 16 || War Cross with two swords, DSO, DFC with bar ||
|-
| Jørstad, Nils Kolbjørn || align="right"| 7 ||  ||
|-
| Lundsten, Leif || align="right"| 5 ||  || KIA 9 June 1944
|-
| Mehre, Helge Olrik || align="right"| 6 ||MBE War Cross, DSO, DFC (US) ||
|-
| Sognnes, Helge || align="right"| 6 ||  || KIA 22 June 1943
|-
| Weisteen, Tarald || align="right"| 9 || DFC with bar ||
|}
